scripts.dist: npm run deps && magic make dist/desktop dist/touch-pad dist/touch-phone
scripts.dist-gemini-test: http-server -s -p 8000 & p=$!; gemini test test/dist/dist.gemini.js --reporter html --reporter flat; e=$?; kill -9 ${p}; exit ${e}
scripts.dist-gemini-gather: http-server -c "no-cache, no-store" -s -p 8000 & p=$!; gemini gather test/dist/dist.gemini.js; kill -9 ${p}
scripts.build-all: npm run deps && magic make desktop.examples desktop.tests desktop.docs touch.examples touch.tests touch.docs *.pages/*
scripts.build-gemini: npm run deps && magic make desktop.tests
scripts.build-dists: npm run dist && node test/dist/build-fixtures.js && magic make desktop.pages/browser-tmpl-dist-gemini
scripts.test-all: npm run lint && npm run unit && npm run test-tmpls && npm run gemini && npm run test-dists
scripts.specs: npm run lint && npm run test-specs
scripts.gemini: http-server -s -p 8000 & p=$!; gemini test --reporter html --reporter flat; e=$?; kill -9 ${p}; exit ${e}
scripts.gemini-gather: http-server -c "no-cache, no-store" -s -p 8000 & p=$!; gemini gather; kill -9 ${p}
